title: Ortho - Braces
description: Orthodontic treatment using braces to correct crooked, crowded, or misaligned teeth.
fullContent:
Orthodontic treatment is a dental specialty focused on correcting crooked, crowded, or misaligned teeth and improper bites using braces or other orthodontic appliances.

These appliances gently move teeth into their ideal position, improving the appearance of your smile while enhancing chewing, speech, and overall oral health.

Misaligned teeth can be difficult to clean and may lead to tooth decay, gum disease, uneven tooth wear, and jaw problems if left untreated.

Fixed braces made of metal or tooth-colored ceramic provide precise and long-lasting results.

Treatment is most effective between the ages of 8 and 14, but adults can also undergo orthodontic care successfully.

Typically lasting 12 to 30 months, orthodontic treatment results in a healthy, confident smile.

title: Aligners
description: Clear aligners are a modern, removable orthodontic solution for straightening teeth.
fullContent:
Clear aligners are transparent, removable orthodontic appliances designed to straighten teeth discreetly and comfortably.

They are custom-made using digital impressions and gradually move teeth into alignment.

Aligners are easy to remove, making brushing, flossing, and eating more convenient.

They are suitable for mild to moderate alignment issues and must be worn 20–22 hours per day.

Regular follow-ups ensure predictable and effective results.

title: Dental Fillings
description: Dental fillings are an effective treatment for repairing teeth affected by cavities, decay, cracks, or minor fractures.
fullContent:
Dental fillings are an effective treatment for repairing teeth affected by cavities, decay, cracks, or minor fractures.

At Dhotrad’s Sunny Dental Clinics, we provide advanced dental filling treatments that restore tooth strength, function, and appearance while preventing further damage.

Available filling materials include composite, GIC, silver amalgam, porcelain, and gold.

With proper oral hygiene and regular dental check-ups, fillings can last for many years.

title: Dental Crowns
description: Dental crowns are a reliable restorative and cosmetic solution used to protect and strengthen damaged teeth.
fullContent:
Dental crowns protect and strengthen damaged or weakened teeth while restoring function and appearance.

They are commonly placed after root canal treatment or over dental implants.

Materials include porcelain, ceramic, zirconia, metal, and porcelain-fused-to-metal.

With proper care, crowns can last many years.

title: Root Canal
description: Root canal treatment removes infection and saves the natural tooth.
fullContent:
Root canal treatment removes infected pulp tissue to relieve pain and prevent tooth extraction.

The canals are cleaned, disinfected, and sealed.

A crown is usually placed to restore strength and appearance.

title: Dental Bridge
description: A dental bridge replaces missing teeth and restores function and appearance.
fullContent:
A dental bridge replaces one or more missing teeth using artificial teeth supported by adjacent teeth or implants.

It restores chewing, speech, and smile aesthetics.

With proper care, bridges can last many years.

title: Tooth Extraction
description: Safe removal of severely damaged or infected teeth.
fullContent:
Tooth extraction is performed when a tooth is beyond repair due to decay, infection, trauma, or impaction.

Recovery is usually quick with proper aftercare.

title: Dentures
description: Dentures replace missing teeth and restore smiles.
fullContent:
Dentures are removable or fixed prosthetics designed to restore chewing, speech, and facial support.

Proper care ensures comfort and longevity.

title: Dental Implants
description: Permanent solution for replacing missing teeth.
fullContent:
Dental implants are titanium posts placed in the jawbone to support crowns, bridges, or dentures.

They offer excellent stability, aesthetics, and durability.

title: MouthGuard
description: Protects teeth from grinding, clenching, and sports injuries.
fullContent:
Mouthguards protect teeth from grinding during sleep and injuries during sports.

Custom-made mouthguards provide the best fit, comfort, and protection.

Proper cleaning and storage extend their lifespan.

title: Full Mouth Rehabilitation
description: Comprehensive treatment restoring all teeth for function and aesthetics.
fullContent:
Full Mouth Rehabilitation involves restoring multiple teeth using crowns, bridges, implants, veneers, and whitening.

It improves bite balance, comfort, function, and appearance.

title: Pediatric Dentistry
description: Comprehensive dental care for children at all stages of growth.
fullContent:
Pediatric dentistry focuses on oral health from infancy through adolescence.

Preventive care and early treatment ensure healthy development and confident smiles.

title: Veneers / Cosmetic Dentistry
description: Enhances smile appearance using advanced cosmetic solutions.
fullContent:
Veneers are thin shells bonded to teeth to correct discoloration, gaps, chips, and shape irregularities.

They provide long-lasting aesthetic improvement.

title: Gum Care
description: Treatment and prevention of gum disease.
fullContent:
Gum care focuses on preventing and treating gingivitis and periodontitis.

Regular cleanings, scaling, and good oral hygiene help maintain healthy gums.
